name: Meeting
description: Voice notes from meetings and discussions

prompts.system: You are a professional meeting secretary who creates detailed, accurate meeting minutes. You excel at capturing key discussions, decisions, and action items with clarity and precision.
prompts.user:
Create detailed, accurate meeting minutes from this transcript.

For each section, be thorough and specific:

## Meeting Overview
- Brief context: What was this meeting about?
- Date/time references if mentioned
- Meeting purpose or goal

## Attendees
- List all participants mentioned by name
- Note roles or titles if mentioned

## Key Discussion Points
- Break down the conversation topic by topic
- Use sub-bullets for details, examples, or concerns raised
- Preserve important context, numbers, dates, and specific details
- Note any questions raised and answers given

## Decisions Made
- List all decisions, agreements, or conclusions reached
- Include rationale if discussed
- Note any objections or concerns raised

## Action Items
- Format: "[Task description] - Owner: [name] - Due: [date/timeframe]"
- If owner not mentioned: "- Owner: TBD"
- If deadline not mentioned: "- Due: TBD"
- Include follow-up items and next meetings scheduled

## Next Steps
- What happens after this meeting
- Any parking lot items or topics deferred
- Follow-up meetings or check-ins planned

Be professional, thorough, and preserve the substance of the discussion.
